subject: Economy
question_en: What is the concept of National Income?
explanation_en: National Income, also known as Gross National Product (GNP), is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country within a specific time period, usually a year. It includes both domestically produced goods and services and services received from other countries.
explanation_hi: राष्ट्रीय आयाम (NI) - राज्य की प्रतिदिवस के कार्यकारणना समाधि - राज्य के संयुक्त किताबैंक्षण
explanation: National Income, also known as Gross National Product (GNP), is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country within a specific time period, including domestically produced goods and services as well as services received from other countries.

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the formula to calculate Gainsborough's GDP at Market Price?
explanation_en: GDP at Market Price (Market Value of final goods and services produced) refers to the value of all goods and services produced in a country within a specific time period, excluding the value of capital goods and net taxes but including subsidies. The formula for calculating Gainsborough's GDP at Market Price is:

options.explanation_en: Net National Income is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country after deducting capital goods and subsidies and including net indirect taxes.
